items.title: Spot Prices Wrap: Natural Gas Cash Cruises as Near-Term Fundamentals ‘Tighten Materially’
items.summary: Spot gas prices varied by region but pushed substantially higher overall on Monday as buyers fixated on a burst of near-term demand.

items.title: March Bidweek Natural Gas Prices Slide as Winter Loosens Grip
items.summary: Baseload prices moved lower on the first day of March bidweek trading Monday, with sharp month/month reversals across key hubs as winter demand fades and production holds near record highs.

items.title: Renewables Top 25% of U.S. Power as Coal’s Grip Collapses
items.summary: In 2025, the share of renewables in U.S. electricity generation has surpassed 25 percent. Over the course of the past 20 years, their share has continuously risen from just 8.6 percent in 2007. At the same time, as Statista's Kathraina Buchholz detai

items.title: Indian Refiners' January Crude Processing Fell In January
items.summary: Indian refiners' crude processing (throughput) fell by 0.2% month-on-month in January 2026, reaching 5.63 million barrels per day (bpd) or 23.81 million metric tons, marking a slight decrease after December throughput clocked in at 5.64 million bpd.
